title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 152-3.5 - Reporting
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 152-3.5 - Reporting

State Regulations

Each institution that receives funds under this Subpart
shall file an annual report by August 31 of the calendar year succeeding the
year of its successful application for funding using a form prescribed by the

Department, and/or within 30 days of any request by the Department, providing
any information or documentation as the Commissioner may request relating to
this initiative. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
152-3.5

Adopted

New

York State Register October 7, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 40, eff. 10/7/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
